website_summaries.verdict: Rugged living isn't a cat's style. So instead of a flimsy tent for Socks' sleeping pleasure, offer him this luxuriously padded tent bed instead. Sturdy enough to hold its shape as your cat slinks in and out yet soft enough to provide the sort of pampering he feels entitled to.
pros: With soft, poly-foam walls and a plush pillow for lounging comfort, Socks will love spending time in his private tent
Available in three sizes, five colors, and polyester or faux suede
The bed is machine-washable, foldable for storage or travel, and large enough for the biggest tabby, a pair of felines, or even your small dog
It will also look attractive in your living room
cons: Some complaints that the bed does not hold up well to machine-washing

customer_reviews.title: Great feel, roomy, looks high quality.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my puppy when she was about 12-14 weeks old. I have hopes that when she matures a bit that she’ll use it as a plane to nap, but for now she has crazy fun in it and I’m definitely okay w that! My one wish is that the bottom of the tent was a little thicker material. I would (and probably will) buy again. :)
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: My 16-pound dogs LOVE this "pup" tent. I bought just one, but they fought over it. So, I bought a second one -- but many times they both pile into the same one.
customer_reviews.author: Zouboy

customer_reviews.title: A study in behaviour.
customer_reviews.text: I got two, one for each of my boys. They use them differently. Washed once, still perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Valomajakka

customer_reviews.title: I hate how much my cat enjoys this bed
customer_reviews.text: My cat enjoys this bed so much it's borderline irritating. She really rubs it in my face by staring directly in my eyes while making a big show of rolling around and basking luxuriously inside of it. I've never seen her enjoy something so thoroughly before. My only complaint is that this doesn't come in a larger size. All I have is my sad flat human bed.
customer_reviews.author: Tiny Wizard

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last thru wash!!
customer_reviews.text: This does not wash well! I just got it delivered today, and I washed it on gentle cycle in Coldwater, tumble dry it on low for 20 minutes per the instructions, and the stitching is coming undone all over the place!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Tilley

customer_reviews.title: XL bed does the job for my Frenchie.
customer_reviews.text: It's a cozy bed, my Frenchie seems to like it. The size is accurate/as described (XL) My dog is a 35lb French Bulldog, he barely fits in there so he probably won't be able to stretch himself inside. As long as he's in his cuddle position it'll work for him & keep him warm at night.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves it. She lives in it.
customer_reviews.text: It is kinda of small. My cat weighs about 10lbs. She fits comfortably but won't be able to stretch horizontally. She has been in the house since five minutes after I opened it. Last night, there, this morning, still there. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Itsdarock

customer_reviews.title: Love it, love it my two dogs one 22lbs
customer_reviews.text: Love it, love it my two dogs one 22lbs. Fits well and the other 10lb as well really warm at good price THANK YOU SO MUCH LOVE IT ♡
customer_reviews.author: MARIBEL GOMEZ

customer_reviews.title: Large version is BIG
customer_reviews.text: This pet house is great! It so soft, and my little 4.5lb chihuahua loves it. I purchased the large version of the house, and it's MUCH bigger than I anticipated. The puppy doesn't seem to mind though :)
customer_reviews.author: Jillyn

customer_reviews.title: Great for skittish dogs!
customer_reviews.text: My 35 lb dog likes it! She is a rescue dog who likes the safety of being under a bed, under a blanket hanging off of a couch, or under a table.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just the right fit <3
customer_reviews.text: My little dog which is 36 pds luvs her pet bed! Makes her feel safe, it's easy to wash and move around the house. I highly recommend this product to anyone with little dogs. It's worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Zuli

customer_reviews.title: awesome product:)
customer_reviews.text: At first my dog was hesitant but now he loves it. Really nice quality and really soft.
customer_reviews.author: Ctesta

customer_reviews.title: Little dog loves the big version
customer_reviews.text: Bought the XL version for my small dog, figured he'd like the extra space to sprawl out and he does, here's to hoping he doesn't chew up the sides which are made of foam
customer_reviews.author: David K

customer_reviews.title: FLIMSY, FLIMSY, FLIMSY
customer_reviews.text: For the amount of money this cost me, I had assumed it would be much more sturdy and substantial. It is as light as a feather and the bottom is simply a sheet of fabric. A thin knotty pillow sits inside on top of the sheet of fabric. After a few weeks I was going to wash it but noticed holes in the seams. It would not have survived a romp in the washing machine. So I kept it awhile longer until it got to dirty and just threw it out. I would never buy again
customer_reviews.author: MOJODOOM

customer_reviews.title: XL is just right for 20 lb dog
customer_reviews.text: Our newly adopted shelter pup went right in and loved it. This dogloo gives him a safe place to retreat and the kids know to leave him alone when he's in there. Size XL is large enough for our 20 lb pup to stand up and turn around inside it. He's got plenty of room to lay on his side, belly or back stretched out. The best part is that his snores are mostly contained within the dogloo so we can get some sleep too!
customer_reviews.author: TNTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great bed
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this bed! Well made. Good structure. It has a strong chemical smell out of the package but I aired it out and washed it. I ordered the XL for my 10 lb Yorkshire terrier. It's very roomy. I added a folded blanket to give it more padding. The bed is super soft but still retains its structure. FYI. It is better to be hand washed and air dry. I hand washed it, but put it in my washer to wring out the water, my washer was kind of small for the bed and it caused a rip.
customer_reviews.author: SuperShopper202

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 16 pound Brussels grifon who is very picky about his beds. He absolutely loves this one! I bought the extra large bed and it is plenty big enough with room to spare. I put his blanket and toys in his little pet apartment:-) and he couldn't be happier! Thanks best pet supplies for a great, high quality, comfy bed.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Vine

customer_reviews.title: 🐾My Cats Are Squabbling Over It! Great Pet Bed!🐾
customer_reviews.text: I thought our last tent was great, but WOW! We were slumming and didn't know it. This tent has padded walls that add structure to the body and a nice cushion, not just a thin pad. The description states that this is made of corduroy, but it's not. It's ribbed like corduroy, but it's a fleece of some sort. Still, I like it and my cats are fussing over taking turns. Only one cat ever paid attention to the old tent. Looks like I'll be ordering a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Someone AstonishingTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Updated: I did go one size up for my chunky girl and it was a much better choice. You can see the size difference between the 2 beds and my smaller cat. Both cats love these! My one cat isn't a cat bed cat but seems to love it! Absolutely recommend!!! For chunky cats go one size up but for average size cats the small one is perfect! Small fit her but she is wayyyy more comfortable in the bigger one. She went it all by herself and layed down. She's a chunky cat and fits fine in it. I might go up a size to give her more space but she doesn't seem to mind the size.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Lindberg

customer_reviews.title: Colaspes in on itself!
customer_reviews.text: Made from a VERY cheap foam-like material. It does not stay upright and it collapses in on itself very easily. You can flip it on its side simply by blowing on it. Not sturdy at all. Save your money!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa H.

customer_reviews.title: Great for larger cats
customer_reviews.text: This is a BIG bed. The opening in front is very high. I would have liked to find one as large around, but with a smaller opening. That said, even our little cat likes it. And, our big 18 pound boys are happy to stretch out in there. The pillow is not made with a plush fabric that is super soft. Kind of hard to find beds like that. However, it is a nice full pillow and is plump and can go through the washing machine. Really great product for those who have larger cats.
customer_reviews.author: Laini Bostian

customer_reviews.title: Med size one cat "lives in already", large size slight problem
customer_reviews.text: Our smaller cat, Posy, looked inside... went inside... and has spent her sleeping time in the medium size ever since.... except when our larger cat gets jealous and steps on the soft roof, which easily indents lightly crushing poor Posy (not hurting her though). But the "LARGE" one has thinner side walls which BOTH INDENT inward. Not major problem as flexible so cats lying inside can stretch out... but the sides should have been as thick/supportable as the medium one. So far, neither cat has gone inside the large one.
customer_reviews.author: Movie lover from HB

customer_reviews.title: The corduroy looks nice, but it's not plush inside and is another ...
customer_reviews.text: The padding in this tent is so thin that the coldness from the tile floor goes right through it. The corduroy looks nice, but it's not plush inside and is another cheaply made product from China. There are no layers to the padding. Returned!
customer_reviews.author: ROB W.

customer_reviews.title: Non regulated sizes...
customer_reviews.text: I have a 70Lb Pitty and according to the description here it was Supposedly made for X-Lg dogs... On a Poodle scale maybe... Her head and front shoulder Barely fit!!! There NEEDS to be some sort of regulation for the sizes of dogs... I've Seen them Beasts come in at 140Lbs and Only a Leg would fit in this thing then... If you have a Small Breed your OK... But if you have a Full Sized dog, look somewhere else... Save your frunstrations lol...
customer_reviews.author: Yogi Bellcourt

customer_reviews.title: Looks good on the screen, up close not so much
customer_reviews.text: The material this is made of is very cheap, brush you hand softly against it and it leaves a weird dusty residue on it. I didn't want my girl sleeping in that thing and breathing in whatever those particles were. Returned the next day. The only pro is that it looks cute, not enough for me to give it a higher rating.
customer_reviews.author: J. Castillo

customer_reviews.title: The top doesn't stay up.
customer_reviews.text: It arrived "smushed" in the box and the top never has stayed up. My 10 lb puppy ended up just sleeping on top of it.
customer_reviews.author: Deb F

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy if you have a dog that likes to chew
customer_reviews.text: The base is not dog proof. You expect with price that quality would be better
customer_reviews.author: delo

customer_reviews.title: Separable and washable parts make this worth it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this knowing my puppy would grow out of it, and likely parts or all of it. The things I liked best in this case we're the fact that the pillow was removable, both to stop chewing and washability. Once he started chewing the tent portion itself I had to use it only when he was tired enough to leave it be, but otherwise both tent and pillow are surprisingly durable and did an okay job standing up to sharp puppy teeth initially. I'm glad I bought this as a starter crate "separator" for his plastic create while he was small.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Brick

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: I just received this pet bed today. My dog has very sensitive skin, so I decided to wash this before I let her in it. The instructions say that you can wash this bed on gentle cycle and tumble dry low. When I pulled it out of the dryer, this is what I found. The base was torn up on one edge of the bed. It's almost unusable. For $35, I was expecting better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Leila Laird

customer_reviews.title: Very roomy - nice fabric
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality tent bed. The fabric and design are classy and fit well in my bedroom rather than a bright, cutesy design like some others have. It's quite large and has a removable pillow inside with fleece on one side and the same fabric as the tent on the other side. I have a big, long cat that weighs 13 lbs, and he has plenty of room to spare in there. He can easily stand up, stretch, and change position. He gladly claimed it when he discovered it in my room. :)
customer_reviews.author: E. Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: Great for dogs who burrow!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this bed! I got it for my 12 year old, approximately 15 lb miniature dachshund and she has more than enough room in the extra large. She loves to burrow, but as she has gotten older and developed some back problems, it’s not easy for her to get herself under a blanket like she used to, so this gives her a similar feeling, but much easier to get into. Now, like the true diva she is, she wouldn’t go near it for the first three or four days, even with her favorite blanket in there. But she finally tried it out and now she’s in there all the time!
customer_reviews.author: S in Florida

customer_reviews.title: A few tips on getting the dog comfortable with it
customer_reviews.text: My dog did not want to get in when I first got it. I tried everything from throwing snacks to even trying to carry him and put him in. It was a real struggle. The day I was planning on returning it is when I caught him sleeping in it. A few tips on getting the dog comfortable with it: Grab the cushion out so that your dog can lay on the cushion and get comfortable on it. Also the dog's scent will now be on the product. Then next if your dog has a blanket throw it in with the cushion and eventually the dog should be all comfy and snuggled up inside.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly small, not easily washable, cheap material.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because i liked the colors. It is not easily washable as you cannot just unzip the bed insert, you have to wash the entire bed which in time gets less soft and refined on the inside. Tent material is like a foam that is inside the fabric, which seams very cheap made. Thinking my full grown frenchie could fit inside, it is incredibly small, he can honestly barely get his head inside. This is the 19x19x14
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: My dog plays with it like a toy 🤣 also would be nice if it ...
customer_reviews.text: This is very cute but it is too light. It moved to ez. Maybe should have a heavy bottom to put in. My dog plays with it like a toy 🤣 also would be nice if it had heavier seems with a wire so it was harder to collapse
customer_reviews.author: triGod

customer_reviews.title: Tics,fleas
customer_reviews.text: I saw a review that said this product came with fleas or tics I thought they were lying I get my product day later their was a flea on me I never had them nor my dog.this product all inventory needs to be inspected or Taken off amazon do not buy !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: He loves it
customer_reviews.text: He loves it so much, i ordered the next size up so he has it as he grows. Its very soft and the cushion comes out. when he gets overtired he beats down the side from the outside and then i just pop it back out so when he finally gives in, he goes in for a nap. i think its lack of "sturdiness" is why it is so giving and he likes it so much. But sturdiness is a subjective term when your referring to a plush bed tent...
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: “[Doghouse] for ants”
customer_reviews.text: I’m unclear what the manufacturers consider “large” but my 15 lb mini-schnauzer was too big for this size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft and tempting to kitties.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of this type of pet bed from two different manufacturers for a kitten with a heart murmur. He choose the smaller of the two--not this one--so I put this one in the living room for the older cats to check out. I was surprised and pleased that they all like it, including my little "prima donna" cat who never likes much of anything. She went right into this and conked right out. Nice and soft with a plush little cushion, all washable. A winner and good for a cat or a small dog.
customer_reviews.author: Literary Omnivore

customer_reviews.title: Dexter Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 20 lb schnauzer who is scared of everythign and loves to have caves to hide out in. This is way cuter to have around than a crate so i got it for him for Christmas. he freakin loves it. He won't even sleep in bed with me anymore, he wants to get down and go sleep in his cave. He fits in it pretty good but if he wants to stretch out he hangs out a bit. But my 5 lb maltese can fit in there with him if they want to get cozy! Love it so much!
customer_reviews.author: LeeAnna

customer_reviews.title: 19” model perfect size for Maine Coon cat!
customer_reviews.text: We adopted two young cats, one of which is a Maine Coon mix, so we needed to get a cat cubby that would be big enough for in the future when the Maine Coon gets bigger - she’s not even a year and is already a big girl! The 19” size is perfect - while our cats are young at the time of this review, and both can easily fit inside to snuggle, I have confidence that as the Maine Coon gets even bigger she won’t have any issues fitting inside. The opening and the inside of the cubby are nice and big. Both cats love the softness of the cushion inside, and I catch them lounging in it frequently.
customer_reviews.author: limegreenheather

customer_reviews.title: My Cat Likes to be Hidden
customer_reviews.text: It took my cat a few weeks, he'd peek in and that was it. Then, one day, there he was, all snuggled up inside! He loves it. I haven't washed it yet, but I'm sure from the reviews it will be fine to throw in the wash machine. I like that feature a lot. Winter is approaching and my little guy is almost 15, so he likes to be warm when I turn the temp. down at night. He's 9 lbs. and I got the 18x18x16. Perfect size! So glad I got this for him, he's turned down several beds over the years. This appears to be "the right one" for my Toby.
customer_reviews.author: Karen K.

customer_reviews.title: I have 2 Min Pins and they just love their new beds
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 Min Pins and they just love their new beds! They were so excited as soon as I set them up!
customer_reviews.author: TaniaColey

customer_reviews.title: Christmas for my cat
customer_reviews.text: I put this thing out on Christmas and my cat went right in there and took a nap. Now I have a blanket over it to close off the entrance a bit and he likes that even better. He frequently spends most of a day inside this little house, and then sleeps in it at night. I've bought countless cat beds, but this covered one is what he really wanted. He likes to burrow under stuff. I have a big cat, he weighs 19 pounds, and he fits in this with plenty of room to spare. The pillow is adequate, but you could probably put some blankets or something in there with it.
customer_reviews.author: D3N1Z3Nx

customer_reviews.title: Nicely Made and Soft
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the extra large after reading from several users the small was way too small even for a small dog. Hoping I could entice my 9 lb Chihuahua to use it when he is cold and unable to get a blanket over himself when I am not present was my goal but so far he is scared of it. I am hoping this winter he might take to it. It is nicely made and very soft and seems very good quality. The extra large is not even all that big so I think it is good for a small to medium dog that may want a few extra inches to stretch out.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: My stupid dog couldn't figure out how to lay inside of it so he just crushed it and laid on the top and then DEMANDED a blanket to burrow under, completely ignoring the entire point of the bed. We had it for about a year before we had to trash it because he threw up on the insert part and there was no way to really clean that. The insert has fluff in it that starts to ball up within a few months of having it too, especially if you have a burrower. It does stay up though and it's a pretty sturdy material so I would assume it'd be good for a dog with more intelligence.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Warren

customer_reviews.title: Stop shopping cat / dog condo out there
customer_reviews.text: First I'd like to say I would get an absolutely nothing for my honest review this is the best cat condo I've ever purchased for a very deserving best friend of mine who is an older girl she's nine years old and a bigger girl she's 33 lb so what anyway I got the large size is perfect for her I noticed another reviewer say that her cat almost rub it in her face how much she loves her condo and my kitty does the same thing and I'm thrilled thank you guys for making such a quality product I would have bought two if I could have
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: My pup loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing ever! My dog is super shy and is ALWAYS digging to be under the blankets and pillows. I have been meaning to order this for awhile and I am so glad I did! He LOVES it. The command word is ..”hole, get in your hole” 😂 he already knows what “cage” is so we needed a different command 😂..anyways! It super cozy and my dog gets so snuggly and warm in there. He is about 13lbs and a ChiPoodle mix. I think I could have sized up one size, but he is perfectly fine in his “hole” 🥰🥰🥰🥰LOL
customer_reviews.author: Shae Regan

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated to get this because I have a very finicky cat who lives it on our deck. It is pretty surprising how cold it gets in the winter in So Cal, so I needed something he’d be warm in and stay dry and also that was big enough to fit him (he’s a big guy - 16lbs!). With the help of a little catnip, my kitty boy took to it very quickly and has uses it nightly ever since. It is super soft and has a very cushy removable pillow/pad. For super cold weather, you’ll still need a an electric warming pad tho. Either way, I think it was worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: leosanch81

customer_reviews.title: My puppy loves his comfy pet tent/bed!
customer_reviews.text: My two lb Maltese puppy loves it! Although he probably won’t weigh more than four lbs full grown, it’ll still be a perfect size for him. The pillow inside is very soft. He seems to feel so comfortable and protected in it—he was the runt of his litter so he was used to being picked on and he likes to hide. The pull on the top makes it easy to move from room to room, though his favorite spot is on my bed as pictured. I haven’t washed it yet so not sure how it hold up. But so far, it’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Juliann A.

customer_reviews.title: My cat LOVES this!
customer_reviews.text: I noticed my cat had started sleeping under my bed because of how cold we like our apartment to be, I decided to get him a cat tent and it was the best choice ever! He warmed up to it very quickly and it's now my cats top choice! He is a 10lb fluffy boy and fits comfortably in the 16x16x14 bed.
customer_reviews.author: JuliaVD

customer_reviews.title: A Tee-Pee for my Native American Kitty
customer_reviews.text: A well made pet bed, either for your cat or small dog. It is shaped like a tee-pee and holds its shape once taken out of box and plastic wrapping. My cat was reluctant to use it the first few hours but finally did use it very late that first night. It is well constructed with a very durable material inside and out. It displays much nicer than the usual but very plain pet beds we are used to. It fits nicely with my decor and shall with any decor. Kitty slept in it all night, so, as I can see, it is a successful product for my very spoiled cat. I know you'll like this for your pet.
customer_reviews.author: DIGITALSHOOTER

customer_reviews.title: Great for my dog!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to get this for my dog as the colder months approached and she absolutely LOVES IT! She was skeptical at first as she had never slept in a semi enclosed bed like this but she warmed up to it immediately. The bed is durable, easily storable not taking up too much space and it’s fairly easy to clean and maintain! I haven’t had any issues with it and would highly recommend this to other dog owners looking for a cozy little house for their pup to sleep in during the winter months!
customer_reviews.author: P. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Purrfect for Kitty
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing for cats. I have two Scottish fold kittens about 4 months old. As soon as I unwrapped this and placed in the corner of my living room by their cat tree, they made a b-line for it. They love to sprawl out and cuddle and this is purrfect because cats love enclosed spaces. Very satisfied with the quality and how soft it is. The pillow is the only thing that needs to be cleaned. Just throw it in the wash. Simple.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Get this. If you are worried about room, get the larger version.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for 7 month old toy poodle. After reading the description and reviews from other purchases about sizes, I went with the extra large version. My puppy likes to stretch out and cuddle up and I wanted to make sure that he had enough room to do both. So glad I got this size since it is roomy for him. (He's only 8.5 lbs) Really like it so far. Stays up well and isn't flimsy. I think most importantly for him, it blocks out the light if he snuggles in a corner. It's hard for him to sleep anywhere that isn't dark.
customer_reviews.author: Arrose23

customer_reviews.title: Very nice pet tent!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a new kitten, and she has absolutely loves it! It is SO soft and very warm for her. She almost disappears in the soft pillow, and I really think she is smiling as she sleeps. As she grows, there is still plenty of room for her to stretch out, chase birds and be a mighty big cat in her dreams. I think she will enjoy this tent for years to come. When the tent gets a bit dirty, I just put it in the washer, and it holds up beautifully, even after tumbling in the dryer. Soft as ever too.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Best dog bed on the planet!
customer_reviews.text: This is so perfect for my short haired dachshund who can get cold...he goes in this dog house which holds his body heat keeping him warm and he feels protected. It is very well made looks nice in my home not bulky and ugly like some. I actually have 2 one upstairs and one downstairs. I have only washed the inside cushion which was fine. The only recommendation I would have for the seller is the cushion inside should be thicker and more densely packed. It is very thin and I can see I will need to make one to replace it at some point. Otherwise I love it! thank you
customer_reviews.author: Lynda

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT & PRIVATE!
customer_reviews.text: My 12 lb dog literally fell in love and accepted her new night home ....the first night! She was allowed to sleep with us for the last 6 years but we needed unobstructed movement for ourselves and anticipated a gradual change to her new accommodations would have to occur. NOT! She took to her new comfortable sleeping quarters like a duck to water!!! Well made but bottom cushion needed a additional padding placed underneath. Used an old folded towel to soften floor of bed. One can push down roof to soften bed but privacy is lost when this is done. At least, the option is offered in this dog bed. Great buy.....I purchased the x-large.
customer_reviews.author: saj

customer_reviews.title: Perfect hide-a-way!
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit that I am actually stunned that my 11-pound yorkie mix loves this bed as much as he does. He has always had the run of the house and can sleep wherever he wants. I bought this a few weeks ago and simply put it in a corner of the den with no fanfare. (I knew if I tried to force him to use it, he would never go in it again!) The first day, he ignored it. Second day, he stuck his shoulders in and briefly explored it. After that, he was completely hooked! It’s his little safe place! He loves it so much that I’ve now got 3 of them scattered thru the house!
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Pet cave for cats!
customer_reviews.text: This cave was larger than I thought it would be. I opened it up and put it on the floor in the bedroom to ponder where I would put it. I turned around and my little Lucia (a very skittish cat rescue), went inside and would not come out. Such a wonderful transformation! It's now her cave and it's next to the bed in the bedroom. She loves it and won't let any of the other rescues occupy it. (The other caves--cat pods--are outside on a covered porch.)
customer_reviews.author: L. Dobbins

customer_reviews.title: Soft and cozy for my pupper!
customer_reviews.text: This bed is adorable. I bought it for my small dog who likes curling up in covered spaces, like under the bed or a blanket rack. She seems to like it, although it’s currently summer here so she hasn’t been staying inside for very long, probably because it gets warm. She’s a cockapoo and she has a lot of floof that keeps her warm, so this probably wouldn’t be an issue for short haired pups. That said, I think it will be a better fit for her when the weather cools down.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: EVERYBODY HAPPY
customer_reviews.text: I bought the house for 2 chihuahuas. The small 1 took the bottom level. The bigger 1 was afraid of stairs so I bought the ramp. Bigger 1 was able to get 2 the upper level but still wasn't completely happy, so I bought this. Now they're both happy which makes me happy. .they are 2 and 5 pounds
customer_reviews.author: JLTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Excellent small dog or cat bed/house
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy soft, yet sturdy and flexible shell of fabric with soft lining and soft, fluffy pillow that is removable and can be washed separately from the house. House can also be easily be hand washed or if it’s suggested by the manufacturer, in a large washer especially for the 19x19 house which is what I bought for my large cat. She goes there in moments of loud noises outside, when she is chilly and wants a warm nap, when she wants privacy, or when she wants her “me” time.
customer_reviews.author: Dayna A. Safranek

customer_reviews.title: Corgi approved
customer_reviews.text: My baby Corgi loves her little “hut”. She is 6 months old and probably doesn’t have too much more to grow so I think this size (18”x18”) will stay a good size for her. At first she didn’t understand that she could go inside so we would often find her sleeping on top of it. (It bounces right back in shape). So I started putting treats inside of it until she got the idea. Now she prefers to sleep in it rather than on our bed. It’s very high quality too! I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: VictoriaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: He seems to love it. Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Ordered XL for my 20lb cat. He seems to love it. Happy with purchase. Should work well for a small to medium size dog or large cat.
customer_reviews.author: Bama

customer_reviews.title: Fits large cats as well
customer_reviews.text: I bought for Maine Coon Cat because cat houses were too small to fit him comfortably. I took out the included pillow because it was too fluffy for him and put in a blanket. He seems to like it. The house has enough foam in the walls to keep it upright but will collapse under any weight put on it. It has given him his own private space to hide and relax. I have not needed to clean it yet but I can imagine his fur will clean off easily as the material it is made of is has a low pile.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bed your pet will love it !
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned that the medium sized bed would be too small , however it is perfect easy to set up right out of the box and my chihuahua love it !! She is able to fit inside comfortably and perfectly ! This size is perfect for cats and small/toy breed dogs only !
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: Cute & cozy
customer_reviews.text: My little 6lb dog doesn’t love this. I think she just prefers to be near me , but this is cute for the price. I keep all her toys in there. I originally bought it for her to sleep in at night but she will only sleep on my bed. I even put it on my bed but she still wouldn’t sleep in it. This is a cute product. I prefer the cushion was a zipper so I could wash it more. I’m not sure of the stuffing inside the pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie McGraw

customer_reviews.title: Cute but easily destroyed
customer_reviews.text: Pros - cute, pretty color, blends in well with the rest of our home, cozy Cons - runs small (19x19x19 works well for dogs between 5-12 LBS); it does not last :( my 5 month old puppy has destroyed it in less than 2 months. I’ve been noticing all this foam all over the house and wondering where it came from. Realized that he somehow managed to rip it up and now it’s pretty much ruined.
customer_reviews.author: Kona K

customer_reviews.title: We like it
customer_reviews.text: I got the largest size for my 4mo old toy poodle pup. Did he really need the biggest size? No im sure he would have fit in the small or medium but he has so much fur that he doesn’t usually use beds he likes to lay down on cold tile. But he also likes to sleep w his head in the dark which is why I got it. I got the 19in because I didn’t want him to get too hot inside. Im happy with it. The sides of the house look like they want to cave in but its not.
customer_reviews.author: Mojojojo

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality is good, the size is good, but the cat will not go inside. I put toys inside it to get him to check it out but i found the tent in the other room when i came home from work. Maybe he thinks its a toy. I will keep it anyway and it is a good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: gm1

customer_reviews.title: Soft, comfy and attractive
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my crazy Kitty and she prefers sleeping in the box it came in. It is good quality, soft and comfy, attractive, and arrived quickly in good packaging. She has slept in it a few times and I added cat nip to it last night which seemed to do the trick. Hopefully tonight I can throw away the box...
customer_reviews.author: A. Mattox

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for our shih tzu. He loves it. It took place of his crate. He sleeps in it constantly. I’m very happy with the purchase 😁. It’s made sturdy, I would think it would be easy to clean based on the material type. Our little one has yet to get it dirty. I think it would hold up well to washing. The pillow is soft but not too thick so it’s not like sleeping on a fluffy sink in kind of pillow. I would certainly purchase one again.
customer_reviews.author: Katie O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Looks comfy, high quality, dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: The dog jumped into it even before I set it on the floor! Great quality. I would be afraid of washing it in vertical washing machine with agitator (I think that could damage it). The tag also shows not to put it in the dryer (I would not sure to the material that is used at the bottom - some rubber like lining or something so that it does not slide on the floor). I am thinking about getting a second one.
customer_reviews.author: bar123

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for an introvert older kitty
customer_reviews.text: My older kitty has never been very social and when grandchildren are at my house, she feels very vulnerable and goes looking for a place to hide and be invisible til they leave. I bought this to give her convenient place to do that. I put it in a barely visible corner of my bedroom, tossed in a little catnip and a kitty treat or two and walked away. It took her a day or two, but once she discovered it, she loved it. I can’t even tell when she’s in her bed because she’s dark and so is the interior of her world. She now has a safe, comfortable, inconspicuous place to hide out.
customer_reviews.author: David W.

customer_reviews.title: Cat stole the dogs bed
customer_reviews.text: Sooooo... originally, bought this XL tent bed for my Chihuahua and Dachshund, they love to sleep together and thought they'd love this. Apparently our Egyptian Mau Cat called Dibs! He LOVES it. It's great quality and our cat is all about it. We picked up a roofless bed and the dogs went with that one instead. So I suppose we'll keep it for the cat.
customer_reviews.author: Shauna Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stay up always flat
customer_reviews.text: The house doesn’t stand up always flat so my pets can’t get inside
customer_reviews.author: Momo89

customer_reviews.title: Pros and Cons
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Cat loves it Looks nice Well made Sturdy Cons I have a medium sized cat, but she’s fat. It needs to be a little larger so her entire body can fit inside. This is more sized to a tiny chihuahua. I really wish it were just a little bigger The pillow that cake with it isn’t very soft, and it was pleated in the middle (that’s the best way I can describe it). The pillow needs to be soft, and perfectly square (or round) instead of the pillow that currently comes with it. I can’t imagine that pillow would be comfortable
customer_reviews.author: K B.

customer_reviews.title: XL was perfect for my 12-lb Havanese
customer_reviews.text: I’ve got two 12-lb Havanese. My little girl displays some anxiety and likes to hide away when she is tired or scared. I didn’t think my boy would use it but I wasn’t sure if he would climb in with her so I went with XL. She went into it right away and made herself at home! I was so relieved because she looked so comfortable and cozy. My boy crawled in once and got out with zero interest. I’m still glad I got an XL because with a blanket and toys it’s still cozy. She did start panting after a bit so it does get a little warm.
customer_reviews.author: DeeOz

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: My puppy love it!!! it is so cute and perfect for her. she is a yorkie, only 6lbs. I got the large one. I am glad I did, i would not go smaller! she has room to turn around and lay comfortably!! Love this product!!! highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: jok3r

customer_reviews.title: We like it.
customer_reviews.text: Our poor dog. Always has been afraid of bad weather. Now she is 14 and she started to have panic attacks. Goes looking for places to hide. Trouble is she stays two minutes and off she goes again. She was raised a house dog so she has beds everywhere but we were looking for a little hiding place for her. I would say its 50-50. She sleeps in it but then again she sleeps everywhere, (Like I said she is 14). Glad we got it for her. If you dog likes it then its worth the money, Right?
customer_reviews.author: Ernest

customer_reviews.title: Our cat loves his bed. Sturdy, well made.
customer_reviews.text: This bed is our older cat’s favorite place to be. I put it in the cubby in a desk and he sleeps there for hours purring the whole time. It’s well made and soft. The top does not collapse but offers the kind of private sleeping spot cats love. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Clark

customer_reviews.title: My cat in unenthusiastic, but it is fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so like, my cat doesn't use it. He is an indoor/outdoor cat, and I thought this design would be PERFEFT for him... he likes sleeping under our shed, or in a box with pillows I created for him before we took him inside. Buuuut, no... even tho this item is shaped and designed perfectly for the kind of tight and safe environment he likes, he has yet to wander in to this bed. He likes my couch better. Howeverrr, I am rating this item 5 stars because it is absolutely perfect... plush, roomy (I bought a larger size), looks easy to clean, and is literally the perfect design for a cat to have privacy.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: OLD DOG SURPRISE
customer_reviews.text: We lived in south Fl. for many years. It doesn't get very cold there more than a couple of days a year. Now in central Fl. the winter months can and do get very cold. My 14 year old Chihuahua hates cold weather. I bought this for her and set it up never thinking she would get in it. It arrived in the summer and after I opened it up and turned my back she snuggled up inside it. This was a big surprise for me. She often gets inside and sleeps. The weather is just now starting to get cool so when she is missing I'll know where to look. I'm 100% satisfied and so is she.
customer_reviews.author: Kath

customer_reviews.title: If you're looking for a cat bed, STOP HERE, you've found it!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best pet product I have ever purchased. My cats LOVE this thing. If there's ever a time I can't find them, I know just where to look! I keep their tent on my dresser right in front of a window. It keeps them up high so they know our dogs won't bother them, they can look out the window, or just curl up in the sun. At least one of them is in there 22/7 😂 My cats are big boys....15 pounds each, and they can both fit in the XL tent comfortably. It also looks really nice, love the grey lattice pattern!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn K

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This bed is great. I bought it for my cat but my dog (13 pounds) ended up stealing it. I think my cat would fit in it, but he's convinced himself he won't. He does seem interested in it, so I'll buy the next size up for him. My dog ran right in it and it seems nice and soft and cozy. Update: My 12 pound cat cat has now decided he loves this after he figured out he could in fact fit in the medium size, and he sleeps in it all day. I love it even more now.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our mini schnauzer
customer_reviews.text: We rescued a 7 month old mini schnauzer who is a bit skittish and likes to be "under" something - a chair, the sofa, anything. We had to retrain her to sleep in her own bed, not ours. She immediately went into this bed and loves it! She is 16 pounds and kind of tall compared to other minis, but this is the exact right size for her. Well worth the investment!
customer_reviews.author: Maryellen H

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love these dog beds.
customer_reviews.text: I have two Miniature Pinscher dogs. They absolutely love these beds. I keep a fluffy blanket in each bed and my girls love to sleep in these little huts. I have two in my laundry room (where they stay when I’m not home), and another two in my bathroom and they each sleep in these when I’m in the shower. I would highly recommend these if your small dogs like a closed-in feel kind of bed. These are by far my favorite kind of dog beds.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: She loves it!
customer_reviews.text: our 14 yr old rescue dog we got 2 months ago went right into it without a second of hesitation & sleeps in it all night. After first receiving and opening, I had to air out outside in fresh air for several hours before bringing in house due to very strong smell in fabric. Smell was gone after airing it. Purchased the "XL- 19" x 19" x 19" size & is the perfect size for our 12 lb. dog. Really can't imagine a larger dog getting comfy in it. Overall very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Soft n Cozy
customer_reviews.text: I graduated my furbaby from the metal cage. I decided to order her a bed that would act as a den like her cage but more cozy. I have a 22-24lb Boston Terrier and she fits in there perfect with a little leg room. I ordered XL and when I took it out the box, I was a little skeptical that it wasn’t big enough but it worked. Its comes with a little plush pillow to lay at the bottom. I put cardboard at the bottom of the bed so that it would maintain stability and shape. Overall, I like it and most of all my furbaby likes it too! Good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Our cats worship this bed !
customer_reviews.text: Will be buying another as my two cats are constantly in it, one asleep the other coming to check if it's available ! Only bought one as our older cat never liked cat beds.....but LOVES being warm, cuddled and safe in this little cave. We bought the small and its perfect for our 7 and 9 lb cats. If you have larger cats or dogs of any size get a larger size bed.....as this is snug....which they love but is snug for them. It seems durable, warm and gets a HUGE endorsement from the two votes that matter !
customer_reviews.author: J&K

customer_reviews.title: My 17lb dog doesn't fit in XL bed
customer_reviews.text: The tent bed is very cute! Looks as pictured. I never looked at the dimensions, I just figured an XL should be big enough for my 17lb. dog. My dog is a den dog and loves to be in cave-like structures but when I put her inside I see that she can fit but she runs back out. Maybe its too snug for her? I also find the sizing labels to be a bit misleading. You would think an XL would be big enough and unfortunately, this is the biggest size they have. Will have to return.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan M

customer_reviews.title: Cat Approved
customer_reviews.text: All of my cats have approved this bed. The cushion is very soft and it's just the right size for them to curl up in and stay warm. The first night, one of them crawled in around 7 pm and didn't get out of it until the next morning! I like the color, it's neutral and doesn't stand out. Nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Jan McG

customer_reviews.title: Love it and cat does too!
customer_reviews.text: Bought an XL based on some reviews and because I have a fat cat but I could have gone with an L just fine. She loved it the minute it was up and it has held up well for about a month now. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Arvizu

customer_reviews.title: Mikey LOVES His Bed
customer_reviews.text: First Mikey, the 12 lb Minpin, saw the cushion. He threw himself on it. When I put the cushion in the tent he got in and would not get out. Poor little man. He is so happy. I ordered another for upstairs. The large is big for him. In winter with his sweaters and blankets it will be fine. The tent and cushion washed and dried well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Took some time but here we go! Association learning
customer_reviews.text: Took some time to get my big cat to like this yurt but now she does!! I would suggest putting some catnip in it to facilitate the transition and keep the box around the cat's good bowl to promote positive association learning
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Love at first sight
customer_reviews.text: Our cat loves this bed. She was not using her old bed which was open, and started sleeping on our bed. She was tired of being kicked around while we slept, and we were tired of being worried about kicking her. We are so happy we found this bed on amazon. The minute we took it out of the box, Lilly went right in and started kneading. She loved it instantly! We put the bed on a table right next to our bed. It has been several days now and she sleeps there every night!
customer_reviews.author: Sun

customer_reviews.title: Well Built and Nice Looking
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited when I opened the box to the pet cave. I knew it would be a bit small (I had tried to measure to get an idea of size) but it was just a tiny bit smaller than I thought. Although my cat likes really tight spots, she did not even try to go in. After a couple of days and no interest in the cave, I returned it. I was really hoping for her to use it, since she had injured her leg and couldn't get up in her cat tree. The product itself is well built and very nice looking and would probably work well for most cats.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little man cave for our pup, it’s small and cozy for him. He loves being nestled in it. It’s sturdy and soft, easy to clean. It doesn’t limp to the side or anything. (Photo I loaded turned sideways, don’t know why?)
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: My cat doesn't like much, but she loves this!
customer_reviews.text: There are very few things my cat likes. I'm not one of them, but this thing is! We call it her igloo, and she was sleeping in it within an hour of its arrival and it's been her go-to sleeping spot ever since. It's even replaced her crawling under the covers of the bed! We tented it with a blanket she likes to make it warmer, darker, and more private, too, since she likes to be hidden. It's nice and roomy, too. She's only 9lbs so she's not that big, but she has plenty of room to curl up or stretch out however she wants.
customer_reviews.author: DV

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Easy to pop open and dogs love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 happy pups now! I got this for my senior citizen dog that shivers all the time. I can hear her snoring happily as I write this review. Even the blind dog easily finds her way in and out of it and loves her little den. After I set up the first one and confirmed it as a success, I immediately bought another one. I was concerned that I would have to turn the thermostat up for my two old dogs and now, thanks to these pet caves, I don’t have to! Thank you for making these! My dogs are 7-12 pounds and I got a large and an extra large although large is fine for both.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa K.

product_meta.title: Pet Tent Soft Bed for Dog and Cat by Best Pet Supplies
product_meta.description: Size:19" x 19" x H:19"| Color:Corduroy Beigegive your pet the GIFT of AMAZING COMFORT shopping around for the perfect pet bed for that adorable cat or dog? These pet tents for small dogs and cats are designed to sail your baby to pet paradise every time they jump into it. Weve lined the inside with super soft poly-foam, fitted the tents with an ultra-plush pillow, and given them a cozy room that your pet will absolutely love. Treat your furry friend to a cozy space to make their days that much comfier! These tent beds aren't just a treat for your pet; theyll have you cracking a smile every time you catch a glimpse of them! Weve used a mix of contemporary shape, fabric, and color to fill any room with instant charm and character. Our eye-catching beds come in suede or corduroy finishes, and are available in a beautiful choice of color to match any dé cor. And thanks to the premium materials, youre of the pet tents remaining in head-turning condition for ages to come. here are more reasons why youll love these pet tents: they do not collapse like other cat and puppy tent houses. Can be machine washed (on gentle cycle) without losing shape. come with an anti-skid base that keeps them in place. Can be quickly assembled and disassembled for cleaning or travel. available in a wide range of sizes to comfortably fit your pet. count on our tent beds to pamper your pet with remarkable comfort, a touch of privacy, and coziness that will have them floating about in cloud nine.
feature_bullets: PLUSH PET TENT: We’ve designed these tent houses for dogs and cats using faux suede, linen or corduroy and each comes with soft poly-foam lining.
GREAT INDOOR LOOK: The timeless style of our corduroy beige plush pet beds allows them to seamlessly blend into any décor.
COZY HOUSE: The dimension of this indoor tent gives your pet a touch of privacy and creates a nice sense of security. 19 x 19 x 19 inches.
EASY TO MAINTAIN: The tent is machine washable without stretching out of shape and acts like a soft crate making traveling simple.
DESIGNED TO LAST: We carefully make our soft tents for dogs and cats to give them maximum durability.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
